=== About me ===

I'm DJEBALI Tarek, web developer. Abducted by webdsign, I try every day to use open source tools to do my things. My first contact with linux's world was
on 99 when i saw for the first time a redhat splash screen. Ubuntu user since 2008, I joined the Tunisian LoCo Team in the same year. I'm now doing my best to
promote ubuntu and FOSS.
